00054 // Base Geometry
00055 class OSIMCOMMON_API Geometry
00056 {
00057 public:
00058     // Basically subtypes so that we can do dynamic casting safely on GUI side, based on type
00059     enum GeometryType{
00060         None, Sphere,  Cylinder, Cone, Ellipsoid, Torus, Line, Arrow    
00061     };
00062 private:
00063     bool            _fixed; 
00064 protected:
00065     GeometryType    _analyticType;
00066     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067     // CONSTRUCTION
00068     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 public:
00070     Geometry():
00071     _fixed(true),
00072     _analyticType(None)
00073     {}
00074     virtual ~Geometry() {}
00075     //=============================================================================
00076     // METHODS
00077     //=============================================================================
00078     // Retrieve analytic type
00079     const GeometryType getShape() const
00080     {
00081         return _analyticType;
00082     }
00083     // Check if the geometry corresponds to an analytic geometry
00084     virtual bool isAnalytic() const
00085     {
00086         return _analyticType!=None;
00087     }
00088     // Mark geometry as Fixed (so that vtk resources are allocated once,
00089     // potentially use the same vtkGeometry more than once.)
00090     virtual void setFixed(bool aFixed)
00091     {
00092         _fixed = aFixed;
00093     }
00094     virtual bool getFixed() const
00095     {
00096         return _fixed;
00097     }
00098 
00099 //=============================================================================
00100 };  // END of class Geometry
00101 
00102 /***
00103  * LineGeometry is a utility class used to abstract a line segment.
00104  * It is used by muscle segments so that it's as small and useful as possiblethe 
00105  * For muscle segments, GUI is free to display it as a line, cylinder or ellipsoid
00106  */
00107 class OSIMCOMMON_API LineGeometry : public Geometry
00108 {   
00109 protected:
00110     SimTK::Vec3 _point1;
00111     SimTK::Vec3 _point2;
00112 public:
00113     LineGeometry(SimTK::Vec3& aPoint1, SimTK::Vec3& aPoint2):
00114       Geometry()
00115     {
00116         _analyticType=Line;
00117         _point1 = aPoint1;
00118         _point2 = aPoint2;
00119     }
00120     LineGeometry():
00121       Geometry(),
00122       _point1(0.0),
00123       _point2(0.0)
00124     {
00125         _analyticType=Line;
00126     }
00127     virtual ~LineGeometry() {}
00128     // Get & Set end points
00129     void getPoints(SimTK::Vec3& rPoint1, SimTK::Vec3& rPoint2) const 
00130     {
00131         rPoint1 = _point1;
00132         rPoint2 = _point2;
00133     }
00134     void getPoints(double rPoint1[], double rPoint2[]) const // A variant that uses basic types for use by GUI
00135     {
00136         getPoints(SimTK::Vec3::updAs(rPoint1), SimTK::Vec3::updAs(rPoint2));
00137     }
00138     void setPoints(SimTK::Vec3& aPoint1, SimTK::Vec3& aPoint2)
00139     {
00140         _point1 = aPoint1;
00141         _point2 = aPoint2;
00142     }
00143     void setPoints(double aPoint1[], double aPoint2[])  // A variant that uses basic types for use by GUI
00144     {
00145         setPoints(SimTK::Vec3::updAs(aPoint1), SimTK::Vec3::updAs(aPoint2));
00146     }
00147 };

00149 class OSIMCOMMON_API ArrowGeometry : public LineGeometry
00150 {   
00151 public:
00152     ArrowGeometry(SimTK::Vec3& aPoint1, SimTK::Vec3& aUnitDirTo, double aLength):
00153       LineGeometry(aPoint1, /* aPoint1+aLength* */aUnitDirTo)
00154     {
00155         _analyticType = Arrow;
00156     }
00157     virtual ~ArrowGeometry() {}
00158 };

00167 class OSIMCOMMON_API AnalyticGeometry : public Geometry
00168 {    
00169 
00170     // Common array of attributes for analytic geometry we can represent
00171     // Meaning depends on _analyticType as follows.
00172     // Amended with a quadrants array to support pieces of analytic geometry (for wrapping)
00173     // Sphere   [Radius, unused, unused, unused, unused, unused]
00174     // Cylinder  [Radius, Height, unused, ...]
00175     // Cone      [BaseRadius, TopRadius, Height, unused, ..]
00176     // Ellipsoid [AxisLength1, AxisLength2, AxisLength3, unused, ..]
00177 private:
00178     bool                    _bounds[6];     //-X, +X, -Y, +Y, -Z, +Z
00179     bool                    _piece;
00180 public:
00181     AnalyticGeometry(GeometryType aGeometricType):
00182         _piece(false)
00183     {
00184         _analyticType=aGeometricType;
00185         for(int i=0; i<6; i++) _bounds[i]=true;
00186     }
00187     virtual ~AnalyticGeometry() {}
00188     void setQuadrants(const bool quadrants[6])
00189     {
00190         _piece=false;
00191         for(int i=0; i<6; i++){
00192             _bounds[i]=quadrants[i];
00193             _piece = _piece || (!quadrants[i]);
00194         }
00195     }
00196     void getQuadrants(bool quadrants[6])
00197     {
00198         for(int i=0; i<6; i++){
00199             quadrants[i]=_bounds[i];
00200         }
00201     }
00202     const bool isPiece() const
00203     {
00204         return _piece;
00205     }
00206 };
00207 
00208 class OSIMCOMMON_API AnalyticSphere : public AnalyticGeometry
00209 {
00210 protected:
00211     double              _attributes[1];
00212 public:
00213     AnalyticSphere():
00214         AnalyticGeometry(Sphere)
00215         {}
00216     AnalyticSphere(double radius):
00217         AnalyticGeometry(Sphere)
00218         {
00219             _attributes[0] = radius;
00220         }
00221     virtual ~AnalyticSphere() {}
00222     const double& getRadius() const
00223     {
00224         //assert(_analyticType==Sphere);
00225         return _attributes[0];
00226     }
00227     void setSphereRadius(double radius)
00228     {
00229         //assert(_analyticType==Sphere);
00230             _attributes[0] = radius;        
00231     }
00232     static AnalyticGeometry* createSphere(double radius)
00233     {
00234         AnalyticSphere* sphere = new AnalyticSphere();
00235         sphere->setSphereRadius(radius);
00236         return sphere;
00237     }
00238 };  // AnalyticSphere
00239 
00240 class OSIMCOMMON_API AnalyticEllipsoid : public AnalyticGeometry
00241 {
00242 protected:
00243     double              _attributes[3];
00244 public:
00245     AnalyticEllipsoid():
00246         AnalyticGeometry(Ellipsoid)
00247         {}
00248     AnalyticEllipsoid(double radius1, double radius2, double radius3):
00249         AnalyticGeometry(Ellipsoid){
00250             _attributes[0] = radius1;
00251             _attributes[1] = radius2;
00252             _attributes[2] = radius3;
00253     }
00254     virtual ~AnalyticEllipsoid() {}
00255     void setEllipsoidParams(double radius1, double radius2, double radius3)
00256     {
00257         //assert(_analyticType==Sphere);
00258         _attributes[0] = radius1;
00259         _attributes[1] = radius2;
00260         _attributes[2] = radius3;
00261     }
00262     void getEllipsoidParams(double params[])
00263     {
00264         //assert(_analyticType==Ellipsoid);
00265         for(int i=0;i<3; i++)
00266             params[i] = _attributes[i];
00267     }
00268 };

00270 class OSIMCOMMON_API AnalyticCylinder : public AnalyticGeometry
00271 {
00272 protected:
00273     double              _attributes[2];
00274 public:
00275     AnalyticCylinder():
00276         AnalyticGeometry(Cylinder)
00277         {}
00278     AnalyticCylinder(const double radius, const double height):
00279         AnalyticGeometry(Cylinder)
00280         {
00281             _attributes[0]=radius;
00282             _attributes[1]=height;
00283         }
00284     virtual ~AnalyticCylinder() {}
00285     void getCylinderParams(double params[]) const
00286     {
00287         //assert(_analyticType==Cylinder);
00288         params[0] = _attributes[0];
00289         params[1] = _attributes[1];
00290     }
00291 };

00293 class OSIMCOMMON_API AnalyticTorus : public AnalyticGeometry
00294 {
00295 protected:
00296     double              _attributes[2];
00297 public:

00299         AnalyticGeometry(Torus)
00300         {}

00302         AnalyticGeometry(Torus)
00303         {
00304             _attributes[0]=ringRadius;
00305             _attributes[1]=crossSectionRadius;
00306         }
00307     virtual ~AnalyticTorus() {}
00308     void getTorusParams(double params[]) const
00309     {
00310         //assert(_analyticType==Torus);
00311         params[0] = _attributes[0];
00312         params[1] = _attributes[1];
00313     }
00314 };

00316 class OSIMCOMMON_API PolyhedralGeometry : public Geometry
